ZrTi.name: Zr-Ti
ZrTi.help: The Zr vs. Ti and Ti vs. Zr basalt discrimination diagrams of Pearce and Cann (1973), and Dilek and Furnes (2009), respectively.

AnAbOr.name: An-Ab-Or
AnAbOr.help: An-Ab-Or diagram for tonalite, trondhjemite, granodiorite, and granite of Barker (1979)

CrY.name: Cr-Y
CrY.help: Cr vs Y discriminant for MORB, IAT, and boninites of Dilek et al. (2007)

LaYb.name: La/Yb-Yb
LaYb.help: (La/Yb)_N vs. Yb_N diagram of Martin (1986), which discriminates between Archean TTG suite and more modern adakites on the one hand, and classical island arcs on the other hand.

NbLaYb.name: Hollocher Nb-La-Yb
NbLaYb.help: Discriminants for MORB, ocean island, and a variety of arc-type basalts, Hollocher et al. (2012)

ThNbLaYb.name: Hollocher Th-Nb-La-Yb
ThNbLaYb.help: Discriminants for MORB, ocean island, and a variety of arc-type basalts, Hollocher et al. (2012)

QAPF.name: QAPF
QAPF.help: Streckeisen (1967)'s Quartz - Alkali feldspar - Plagioclase feldspar diagram for classification of felsic and intermediate plutonic rocks.

SrY.name: Sr/Y-Y
SrY.help: (Sr/Y) vs. Y diagram of Drummond (1990), which discriminates between Archean TTG suite and more modern adakites on the one hand, and classical island arcs on the other hand.

ThCo.name: Th-Co
ThCo.help: Th vs Co discrimination diagram of Hastie et al. (2007) for tholeiitic, calc-alkaline, and more alkaline arc series, and basaltic, andesitic, and rhyolitic compositions.

tiv_type.name: Analysis type
tiv_type.help: Type of analysis; LDA, QDA or Shervais

tiv_plot.name: Ternary plot
tiv_plot.help: Produce a ternary plot, rather than a bivariate ratio plot

tizry_type.name: Analysis type
tizry_type.help: Type of analysis; LDA, QDA or Pearce

tizry_plot.name: Ternary plot
tizry_plot.help: Produce a ternary plot, rather than a bivariate logratio plot. Only applicable for LDA and QDA.

zrti_type.name: Analysis type
zrti_type.help: Type of analysis; LDA, QDA, Pearce or Dilek

zrti_plot.name: Ternary plot
zrti_plot.help: Produce a ternary plot, rather than a bivariate ratio plot. Only applicable for LDA and QDA.

plutonic.name: Plutonic
plutonic.help: If ticked, produces the diagram of Middlemost (1994), otherwise produces the diagram of Le Maitre et al. (2004)

twoStage.name: Two stage
twoStage.help: Applies the two-stage magma evolution model of Vermeesch and Pease (2021), rather than the single-stage model

kde.name: KDE
kde.help: Adds a kernel density estimate of the Bowen-Fenner indices on a radial scale (only for Logratio plot)

bandwidth.name: Bandwidth
bandwidth.help: The smoothing bandwidth to be used for the kernel density estimate

vermeeschPease.name: Decision
vermeeschPease.help: Adds the decision boundary between the tholeiitic and calc-alkaline magma series to the plot (only for Ternary plot)

@title.name: Plot options
@title.help: Options controlling how the plot looks

lwd.name: Point line width
lwd.help: The line width the points are drawn with, default is 1.0

pch.name: Point symbol
pch.help: Plotting symbol to use. Between 0 and 25 for standard symbols or 32 and 127 for ASCII characters

bg.name: Secondary point color
bg.help: Symbols between 21 and 25 have two colours; this is the second one.

col.name: Point colour
col.help: Main colour of the points drawn

@title.name: Decision boundary options
@title.help: Options controlling the look of the decision boundary for AFM or ATM diagrams

@title.name: Bowen-Fenner index
@title.help: Options controlling the visualisation of the Bowen-Fenner index.

kde.name: KDE
kde.help: Add a kernel density estimate to the logratio plot.

bw.name: Bandwidth
bw.help: Specify the algorithm to calculate the kernel bandwidth.

@title.name: Text labels
@title.help: Annotate the discrimination fields with long or short text labels.

Shervais.name: Shervais
Shervais.help: The nominal decision boundaries of Shervais (1982)

Pearce.name: Pearce
Pearce.help: The nominal decision boundaries of Pearce and Cann (1973)

nrd.name: Scott
nrd.help: Scott's variation of Silverman's rule of thumb
